channel.title: Website on Live Free or Dichotomize
channel.description: Recent content in Website on Live Free or Dichotomize

item.title: How to make an R Markdown website (with RStudio!)
item.description: We’ve updated our R Markdown website tutorial to depend on RStudio for simplicity. You can find our previous version if you would rather not depend on RStudio. Setup: Today, more than ever, a website is like a business card. As a graduate student or academic, by having a nice website you are not only providing a one-stop-shop for all of your necessary information, ⊕AND you are illustrating that you have the technical prowess to accomplish this!
